title: The Grand Rockets Debate Continues, the Bucks Feel the Heat, and Murray Mania | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC turn yet another contentious page in their ongoing Houston Rockets debate after the Rockets' embarrassing Game 6 collapse against the Oklahoma City Thunder (1:38) before discussing the predictably competitive Bucks-Heat matchup as well as the other series in the NBA playoffs (32:27).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
